import React from "react" function PomodoroDisplay (props) { {/* TODO: This area should show only when there is an active focus or break - i.e. the session is running or is paused */} return props.session !== null &&
{/* TODO: Update message below to include current session (Focusing or On Break) total duration */}

{props.label} for {props.focusDuration}:00 minutes

{/* TODO: Update message below correctly format the time remaining in the current session */}

{props. timeRemainingInMinutes} remaining

PAUSED

} export default PomodoroDisplay
